code: import{useState,useEffect}from"react";const useMakeRequest=endpoint=>{const[result,setResult]=useState({data:null,error:null});useEffect(()=>{const asyncFunc=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch(endpoint);const json=await response.json();setResult(old=>({...old,data:json}));}catch(error){setResult(old=>({...old,error:new Error(error).message}));}};asyncFunc();},[endpoint]);return result;};export default useMakeRequest;
